condition.p: Here I will go over some common issues that happen with Shanks Hall's gadgets and tools. If you have any issues that are not listed, please contact an AirClassroom representative.

cause.p: I want to freeze the projector screen while I am using the document projector. How do I do that?

step.cmd: Press the "freeze" button on the document projector. To un-freeze, press "freeze" again.

cause.p: I want to zoom in on an object while using the document projector. How can I do that?

step.cmd: Use the "zoom" buttons to zoom in and out. The button with the plus sign will zoom in, and the button with the minus sign will zoom out.

cause.p: I logged onto the Shanks Hall computer and I see Google Chrome and Firefox. Which one do I choose?

step.cmd: Either one will work just fine! However, we recommend that if you are using Google apps, such as g-mail, google drive, etc., you should use Google Chrome to make things easier.
